channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Saturday Kitchen Best Bites
channel.desc: Alexina Anatole has an elevated and lighter version of Sunday roast with roasted chicken on a bed of beer-braised onions served with a fresh kale, ricotta and grapefruit salad. Mary McCartney serves up smoky dogs with caramelised balsamic onions, ketchup and mustard, which are given Hollywood approval by Woody Harrelson.
